subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco 49ers and the Minnesota Vikings may be interested in acquiring the suspended Atlanta Falcons star Michael Vick, who is in federal prison on felony charges related to dogfighting and is scheduled to be released in July. The Falcons have said they will try to trade him, although they could cut him and make him a free agent.
